quotes.author: Betsy DeVos
quotes.text:
[Sen. Chris Murphy]: You can't say definitively today, that guns shouldn't be in schools?

I would imagine that there is probably a gun in the schools to protect from potential grizzlies.

quotes.text: Education, it’s a closed system, a closed industry, a closed market. It’s a monopoly, a dead end.

quotes.author: Betsy DeVos
quotes.text: My family is the biggest contributer of soft money to the Republican Party. I have decided, however, to stop taking offense at the suggestion that we are buying influence. Now I simply concede the point. They are right. We do expect some things in return.
